text: @NYGovCuomo Oh good Lord please! What a tweet! Our Country has had #riots destroying, looting and burning our cities from coast to coast. It appears no one cares or wants any lectures on #COVID19. Unless you’re reminding your people to follow the ‘hide your face’ suggestion on how to protest
